original: Öhlin, Bertil Zacharias, ’häradshövding, fd. revisionssekreterare, Växjö, f. 10/10/89 i Böne, Älvsb. I, av folkskoll. Alfred Ö. o. Albertina Zachri-son. G. 24 m. Bertha Mellgren. Barn: Gunilla f. 25, Birgit 27, Göran 33. — Jur. kand. i Lund 16, assess. v. Göta hovr. 23, tf. rev:sekr. 29, ’hovr:råd 30, rev:sekr. 33, åter hovr:råd 36, hä-radsh. i Ö. Värends dom’s. 37. RNO.
translated: Öhlin, Bertil Zacharias, district judge, former audit secretary, Växjö, born on 10 October 1889 in Böne, Älvsb. I. Son of Alfred Ö. and Albertina Zachrisson. Married on 24 March with Bertha Mellgren. Children: Gunilla, born in 1925, Birgit in 1927, Göran in 1933. Degree in Law from Lund University in 1916, assistant assess. at Göta Court of Appeal in 1923, acting audit secretary in 1929, court councillor in 1930, audit secretary again in 1933, reinstated as court councillor in 1936, district judge in Ö. Värends district court in 1937. Received the distinction of the Royal Order of the North Star.

education.description: Degree in Law from Lund University

occupation.name: District Judge
occupation.description: District judge at Ö. Värends district court

awards.name: Royal Order of the North Star
